Constructor Detail

SpriteHandler

public SpriteHandler();
Default Constructor

~SpriteHandler

public ~SpriteHandler();
Default Destructor

Method Detail

AddFile

public bool AddFile( std::string imageRef, std::string filePath, int frame_count, int col_count, int w, int h );
Adds a file object to the container at the specified key value, or updates the file at the key value if it is already in use.
Parameters:
imageRef - The key value of the file to add or update
filePath - The file path of the bitmap file to load
frame_count - The number of animation frames in the file
col_count - The number of columns of animation frames in the file
w - The initial width in pixels of a frame of animation
h - The initial height in pixels of a frame of animation
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

AddSprite

public bool AddSprite( std::string refName, std::string imageRef, int x, int y );
Adds a sprite object to the container at the specified key value, or updates the sprite at the key value if it is already in use. Uses the specified bitmap file's width and height as the sprite's width and height.
Parameters:
refName - The key value of the sprite to add or update
imageRef - The key value of the bitmap file to associate with the Sprite
x - The initial x-coordinate of the Sprite
y - The initial y-coordinate of the Sprite
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

AddSprite

public bool AddSprite( std::string refName, std::string imageRef, int x, int y, int w, int h );
Adds a sprite object to the container at the specified key value, or updates the sprite at the key value if it is already in use.
Parameters:
refName - The key value of the sprite to add or update
imageRef - The key value of the bitmap file to associate with the Sprite
x - The initial x-coordinate of the Sprite
y - The initial y-coordinate of the Sprite
w - The initial width in pixels of the Sprite
h - The initial height in pixels of the Sprite
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

ChangeBitmap

public void ChangeBitmap( std::string refName, std::string fileRef );
Sets the associated bitmap file for the Sprite at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite
fileRef - The ImageFile container key value for the bitmap.

CheckClicks

public std::string CheckClicks( BoundingBox& pointer );
Checks whether or not any of the active sprites have been clicked or released on by the mouse pointer.
Parameters:
pointer - Reference to the BoundingBox of the mouse pointer
Returns:
The key value of the most recently added sprite (hopefully top sprite) being clicked or released on

DrawSprites

public void DrawSprites( BITMAP* buffer );
Draws the current frame of all active sprites to the specified BITMAP buffer. Removes all inactive sprites from the container after updating.
Parameters:
buffer - Pointer to the Allegro BITMAP struct that sprites should be drawn to

MoveSprite

public void MoveSprite( std::string refName, int new_x, int new_y, int speed );

RemoveFile

public bool RemoveFile( std::string imageRef );
Removes the file object from the container at the specified key value.
Parameters:
imageRef - The key value of the file to remove
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

RemoveSprite

public bool RemoveSprite( std::string refName );
Removes the sprite object from the container at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - The key value of the sprite to remove
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

SetAnimation

public void SetAnimation( std::string refName, int animate );
Sets the frame delay of the Sprite at the specified key value and starts animating the Sprite.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite
animate - The new frame delay value for the Sprite. 0 or less stops animation.

SetFrame

public void SetFrame( std::string refName, int frame );
Sets the current frame of animation for the Sprite at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite
frame - The frame of animation to display.

SetFrameDelay

public void SetFrameDelay( std::string refName, int delay );
Sets the frame delay of the Sprite at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite
delay - The new frame delay value for the Sprite

SetSpriteLocation

public void SetSpriteLocation( std::string refName, int x, int y );
Sets the new position for the Sprite at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite to relocate
x - The new x coordinate for the Sprite
y - The new y coordinate for the Sprite

SetSpriteSize

public void SetSpriteSize( std::string refName, int w, int h );
Resizes the Sprite at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite to resize
w - The new width for the Sprite
h - The new height for the Sprite

SetVisible

public void SetVisible( std::string refName, int visible );
Sets the visibility of the Sprite at the specified key value.
Parameters:
refName - Key value of the Sprite
visible - The new visibility value for the Sprite
